org.dejava.component.util.validation.processor

Class ValidationProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.util.validation.processor.ValidationProcessor

  • public final class ValidationProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Processes validation on fields or objects. The rules for the validations are the ones defined at ValidationMethod. Use Validations and ValidationMethod annotations at your object fields at your will. You can either validate a single annotated field ( validateField(java.lang.Object, java.lang.String)) of an object or the whole object ( validateObject(java.lang.Object, java.util.Set<java.lang.Object>)). Have fun!

    • Method Detail

      • validateField

        public static void validateField(java.lang.Object object,
                 java.lang.String fieldPath)
                          throws FailedValidationsException,
                                 org.dejava.component.util.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException,
                                 org.dejava.component.util.reflection.exception.InvocationException
        Validates a field value. The validation annotations will be used.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be validated.
        fieldPath - Path for the field to be validated.
        Throws:
        FailedValidationsException - If there are failed validations for the field.
        org.dejava.component.util.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the parameters for the method are not valid (empty or not accessible).
        org.dejava.component.util.reflection.exception.InvocationException - If an exception is thrown by a getter of the field.

      • validateObject

        public static void validateObject(java.lang.Object object)
                           throws FailedValidationsException,
                                  org.dejava.component.util.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Validates an object. The validation annotations will be used.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be validated.
        Throws:
        FailedValidationsException - If there are failed validations for the field.
        org.dejava.component.util.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the parameters for the method are not valid (empty).
